rules_text:
Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste. Untap it. Its still a land.
{2}{G}{U}{R}, Exile Dirt to Flesh from your graveyard. Target land you control becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with haste. Its still a land. Untap it. Activate only as a sorcery.
{4}{G}{U}{R}, Put Dirt to Flesh from exile on the bottom of its owner’s library: Target land you control becomes a 7/7 Elemental creature with haste. Its still a land. Untap it. Activate only as a sorcery.
